1.location: You find yourself in a slimy grotto. The walls are covered in sticky slime and the floor is made of hard rock.

portal.content: Dive into the deep pool of slime

interactable.content: A deep pool of slime on the grotto floor
A narrow cave entrance on the grotto wall

The smell of slime is quite strong here.

sound.content: You hear the faint sound of dripping liquid.

2.location: You find yourself in a pitch black grotto.

portal.content: Dive into the deep pool of slime leading back to the grotto

sight.content: You see something glinting in the darkness in front of you.
It is almost pitch black, you see nothing.

It is very dark, but you make out

a deep pool of slime

leading south.

smell.content: The grotto smells like fungus and slime.
The smell of slime is very strong here.

sound.content: You hear a barely audible rumbling sound.

3.location: You find yourself in a pine forest. Giant pine trees surround you. The forest floor is covered in layers upon layers of brown pine leaves and patches of green moss.

portal.content: Climb back into the cave leading north

sight.content: Tall trees stretches on for as far as you are able to see in all directions but north. To the north you see a large grey mountain wall blocking your path, ferns grow thick at the base of the mountain.

You see

a narrow cave entrance

on the northern side of the area.

You see

a narrow cave

leading north to a grotto.

You see

a path

through the pine trees, leading westwards.

smell.content: You detect a faint smell of slime coming from the <d>north</d>.

4.location: You find yourself in a pine forest.

sight.content:
You see

a path

through the trees, leading in an eastwards direction.
